mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccp_trip ( school_id, campus_id, owner_user_id, start_gate_id, start_location_id, start_address, end_gate_id, end_location_id, end_address, total_people, owner_people_count, current_people, departure_time, require_text, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{schoolId}, #{campusId}, #{ownerUserId}, #{startGateId}, #{startLocationId}, #{startAddress}, #{endGateId}, #{endLocationId}, #{endAddress}, #{totalPeople}, #{ownerPeopleCount}, #{currentPeople}, #{departureTime}, #{requireText}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, school_id, campus_id, owner_user_id, start_gate_id, start_location_id, start_address, end_gate_id, end_location_id, end_address, owner_people_count, total_people, current_people, departure_time, require_text, status, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM ccp_trip WHERE campus_id = #{campusId} AND status = 0 AND departure_time >= #{minTime} ORDER BY departure_time ASC

SELECT id, school_id, campus_id, owner_user_id, start_gate_id, start_location_id, start_address, end_gate_id, end_location_id, end_address, owner_people_count, total_people, current_people, departure_time, require_text, status, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM ccp_trip WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT t.id, t.school_id, t.campus_id, t.owner_user_id, t.start_gate_id, t.start_location_id, t.start_address, t.end_gate_id, t.end_location_id, t.end_address, t.owner_people_count, t.total_people, t.current_people, t.departure_time, t.require_text, t.status, t.remark, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time FROM ccp_trip t INNER JOIN ccp_trip_member m ON t.id = m.trip_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND t.status IN (0, 1, 2) ORDER BY t.departure_time ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ccp_trip t LEFT JOIN ccp_trip_member m ON t.id = m.trip_id AND m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 WHERE t.status IN (0, 1, 2) AND (t.owner_user_id = #{userId} OR m.user_id IS NOT NULL)

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ccp_trip t LEFT JOIN ccp_trip_member m ON t.id = m.trip_id AND m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 WHERE t.status IN (0, 1, 2) AND (t.owner_user_id = #{userId} OR m.user_id IS NOT NULL) AND t.id != #{tripId}
